Journal: Journal Of Behavior Therapy And Experimental Psychiatry
Title: Contextual representations of negative images modulate intrusion frequency in an intrusion provocation paradigm
Author: Krans, J., Pearson, D., G., Maier, B., & Moulds, M., L.
ResultSummary: Moderate outcome condition had lower intrusion distress than context-free condition.

Journal: Journal Of Behavior Therapy And Experimental Psychiatry
Title: Encoding disorganized memories for an analogue trauma does not increase memory distortion or analogue symptoms of ptsd
Author: Segovia, D. A.; Strange, D.; Takarangi, M. K.
ResultSummary: Both conditions did not significantly in terms of diary intrusions distress.
Notes_fromMo: Study in total had 6 groups but we only code for 3 groups, so should we report 3 or 6 in the sample size column, the study doesn't provide info on number of participants within each condition.
